about_the_game: The official soundtrack to Riku Lempiäinen's Blank Frame, an indie horror puzzle game about escaping your apartment. The soundtrack is composed by German artist, Gazers, a music duo consisting of Robbert van Bruggen (beats, synths, samples) and Johann Hackl (guitars, bass, vocals). They span multiple genres from synths to rock and experimental.
detailed_description: The official soundtrack to Riku Lempiäinen's Blank Frame, an indie horror puzzle game about escaping your apartment. The soundtrack is composed by German artist, Gazers, a music duo consisting of Robbert van Bruggen (beats, synths, samples) and Johann Hackl (guitars, bass, vocals). They span multiple genres from synths to rock and experimental.

name: Blank Frame - Official Soundtrack
short_description: The haunting soundtrack of Blank Frame as composed by German artist, Gazers, a music duo consisting of Robbert van Bruggen (beats, synths, samples) and Johann Hackl (guitars, bass, vocals). They span multiple genres from synths to rock and experimental.
